entry.title: bitcoin.org SOPA/PIPA blackout
entry.summary: The mailing list for bitcoin development is not an appropriate forum to discuss political issues or religious beliefs. A recent email thread in the mailing list talks about censorship and free speech, with one user suggesting that censorship is a good thing while free speech and democracy are evil. The email includes a link to an article by Bishop Sanborn, which promotes traditional mass and argues against modernity. However, this kind of proselytizing is frowned upon in the mailing list. Meanwhile, a separate advertisement in the email encourages developers to subscribe to LearnDevNow, an online learning library for Microsoft developers.
